alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 9:45AM CST until February 11 at 9:20PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Clarke, Wilcox and Monroe Counties. For the Alabama River...including Claiborne Dam...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 42 feet, Water begins to inundate the Eureka Landing community. At 43 feet, Access to Eureka Landing community stops, with access cut off. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 42.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 28.6 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 42 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
